Methods in ij that return Calibration

 Calibration ImagePlus.getGlobalCalibration()
          Returns the system-wide calibration, or null.
 Calibration ImagePlus.getLocalCalibration()
          Returns this image's local calibration, ignoring the "Global" calibration flag.
